message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds immense value and potential. While I can't disclose the exact nature of it right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm willing to let you acquire it for a price of $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer lined up who's ready to pay $1000000.  Consider this your chance to secure something truly special.  Let me know if you're interested.
